Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This class has been deprecated. Use CodeDomLocalizationProvider instead. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

summary.span: 向根设计器提供本地化功能的设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support for localization features to a root designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用一组属性和方法来扩展 ，这些属性和方法为 .NET Framework 本地化体系结构提供支持。 can extend an with a set of properties and methods that provide support for the .NET Framework localization architecture. 有关使用资源的详细信息，请参阅[本地化](/dotnet/standard/globalization-localization/localization)。For more about using resources, see [Localization](/dotnet/standard/globalization-localization/localization). 使用本地化支持体系结构，设计人员可以使用可在运行时交换以支持各种语言、区域性特定样式和动态可配置功能的资源文件来初始化组件属性。The localization support architecture enables designers to initialize component properties using resource files that can be swapped at run time to support a variety of languages, culture-specific styles and dynamically configurable features. 您可以使用此类的方法，使设计器和代码生成的序列化程序从资源加载并生成使用本地化功能的初始化代码。You can use the methods of this class to enable designers and code generating serializers to load from resources and build initialization code that uses localization features. 随 Visual Studio 一起提供的默认序列化程序已经能够本地化组件和控件，但它们只是在找到对 .NET Framework 本地化体系结构的支持时才这样做。The default serializers that ship with Visual Studio are already capable of localizing components and controls, but they only do so if they locate support for the .NET Framework localization architecture. 若要检测本地化支持的状态，序列化系统必须在根设计器组件上找到名为 "可本地化" 的公共 属性。To detect the presence of localization support, the serialization system must locate a public property named "Localizable" on the root designer component. 如果序列化程序找到此属性，它将搜索名为 "Language" 的类型 的属性以确定当前的资源配置。If a serializer finds this property, it searches for a property of type named "Language" to determine the current resource configuration. 默认序列化程序使用这些属性来确定它是否应该本地化组件的任何可本地化资源，如果是，则应将资源信息保存到 格式。Default serializers use these properties to determine if it should localize any localizable resources of the component, and if so, what format the resource information should be saved in. ## Examples 下面的代码示例向组件添加 。The following code example adds a to a component. [!code-cpp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CPP/class1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CS/class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/VB/class1.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例包含一个示例组件和设计器。The following code example includes an example component and designer. 设计器使用 为组件添加本地化支持属性。The designer uses a to add localization support properties for the component. [!code-cpp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/VB/class1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的服务提供程序和基组件初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified service provider and base component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，新 将当前语言设置为 ，这是一般和默认的语言资源设置。By default, a new sets the current language to , which is the generic and default language resource setting. 此设置将导致设计器生成引用通用语言资源的代码。This setting causes a designer to generate code that references the generic language resource. 您可以创建其他 对象来表示和标识程序在运行时可以使用的其他本地化资源数据。You can create other objects to represent and identify other localized resource data that a program can use at run time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新的 对象。The following code example creates a new object. [!code-cpp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CPP/class1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CS/class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/VB/class1.vb#2)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 处置由 占用的资源（内存除外）。

span.span: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用 后，必须释放对 的所有引用，以便垃圾回收器可以回收 占用的内存。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 如果为 ，则托管及非托管资源都释放；如果为 ，则仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 使用的非托管资源，并选择性地释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 public `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用 `disposing` 设置为 `false`的 `Dispose`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 如果 `disposing` 参数为 true，则此方法将释放此 引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时，请注意不要引用先前在调用 之前已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关 和 的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

span.span: Resets the resource culture for the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在加载设计器时使用本地化资源初始化了指定的对象，则此方法会将指定对象的资源区域性设置为加载设计器时用于初始化指定对象的值的资源区域性。If the specified object was initialized with localized resources when the designer loaded, this method sets the resource culture for the specified object to the resource culture used to initialize the values of the specified object when the designer loaded. 如果指定的对象没有以前的资源区域性设置，则当前资源区域性设置为 。If the specified object had no previous resource culture setting, the current resource culture is set to .
